import React, {useState} from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../assets/velikonocni-cupcaky.jpg' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useContext } from 'react' import { ShopContext } from '../../context/ShopContext' const Navbar = () => { const [menu,setMenu]= useState("shop"); return (

ESHOP

  • {setMenu("Recipes")}}>Recipes{menu==="Recipes"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("Sladké")}}>Valorant{menu==="Sladké"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("sapnap")}}>Sapnap{menu==="sapnap"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("random")}}>Random{menu==="random"?
    :<>}
{localStorage.getItem('auth-token') ? :}
) } export default Navbar
